Layer.StepP1Action5PressMessageCommand:
%function(self) local screenid = tonumber(GAMESTATE:GetScreenID()) == 573555 local edit = GAMESTATE:IsEditMode()
if not screenid and not edit then if not LovelyDay_EvalMusic then LovelyDay_EvalMusic = true SCREENMAN:SystemMessage('Evaluation music enabled.') else LovelyDay_EvalMusic = false SCREENMAN:SystemMessage('Evaluation music disabled.') end end end
